channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- News & Blog Designer Pack
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- News & Blog Designer Pack

item.title: CVE-2022-4792|2024-08-03T01:48:40.438Z -- unknown -- news%20%26%20blog%20designer%20pack
item.description: The News & Blog Designer Pack WordPress plugin before 3.3 does not validate and escape one of its shortcode attributes, which could allow users with a role as low as contributor to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attack.
